Does it crash during startup, or you have to perform some action? The NPE
happening during editor restoration don't seem related. It should only cause you
to see a "Could not restore workbench layout" error dialog. Do you get such dialog?

You might have better luck getting more information on the problem if you skip
the native launcher, running Eclipse directly using java.exe from the
command-line. "cd" into Eclipse install dir:

cd c:\_development\eclipse-3.0\eclipse-sdk-3.0.1-win32\eclipse

Run Eclipse using java.exe:

java -cp startup.jar org.eclipse.core.launcher.Main

You should not get the "JVM Terminated, Exit code = 1" error dialog, but might
get a crash report generated by the VM.
Please reopen when you can provide the information requested above. Thanks.
